title: Socioeconomic Determinants in Diabetic Retinopathy Screening
details: A Movahedan, KJ Wroblewski - JAMA ophthalmology
abstract: In this issue of JAMA Ophthalmology, Chaudhury et al1 looked at the adherence to clinical practice screening guidelines for diabetic retinopathy in 10 157 Black patients and 27 240 White patients, age 18 to 75 years with diabetes, from a …
